DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety of Miglitol in patients with Type1 Diabetes Mellitus treated with insulin.
DOC.brief_title: Open Trial of Miglitol in Type 1 Diabetic Patients With Insulin Treatment
DOC.criteria: Type1 Diabetes Criteria of postprandial glucose and HbA1c are met Type2 Diabetes Patients with antidiabetic drugs The other exclusion criteria are met
